text:
During my time at HBS, I'm
often reminded of the words

"I come as one, but
I stand as 10,000."

During my childhood,
I was raised

by a young, single mother who
was determined to show me life

I was also fortunate enough
to have a community filled

with supportive friends,
family, teachers, and mentors

that showed me the
power of education

and how that could
transform my life.

I know that my
story is not unique.

There are thousands
just like me.

To that end, I want to
use all the opportunities

I've had to this point
to help others who

come from similar backgrounds
or share similar stories unlock

their own potential and leave
their marks on the world.
